website_summaries.verdict: An extra-large, spacious tent that offers the most in terms of space-to-cost value.
pros: Extra large interior sleeps 12 people more comfortably than other large-group tents
Uses higher-quality fabric and stitching to provide 3-season protection
Large windows and floor vents keep the tent cool in the summer
cons: Requires the most amount of space to pitch

customer_reviews.title: only lasted one year
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tent last year for our family fishing trip. It worked out well and it was very roomy. We took it this year as well and had one thunderstorm. It ripped in 3 places from the result of the storm and one of the tabs broke at the bottom of the tent. It tore at the bottom of the entry door and a very large tear at the seam in the middle of the tent. We ended up not being able to stay in it this year.. I was really hoping it would last a few yrs.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: This is a great tent! There is a ton of room
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tent! There is a ton of room, can get plenty of ventilation if you need it while still providing cover during rain. Haven't used during heavy rain, but it works great at keeping out rain and morning dew. Watch the video of how to roll it up, because it is possible to get the tent rolled up and put back into the original bag. Very quick set up and take down time with two people.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Savino

customer_reviews.title: She’s a beast.
customer_reviews.text: It’s big and sturdy. Directions are in an odd form of English. (The portion talking about the 6 long and 4 short poles) Left it up over night and an unexpected storm blew it into the neighbors play set. Few scuffs and one small rip. Otherwise she held up! It did leak a bit (before rolling away) where the door zippers meet. Tent blew away with only base stakes in. Not the included ropes. (Stakes are the typical tiny crap that many come with today) id recommend ordering some of those big plastic or metal stakes if you plan to have it in a windy area.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Colored poles go in matching color sleeves.
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money. Not perfect. One pole was missing a "D" ring. A piece of heavy wire fixed that. Noticed a few tiny holes in mesh roof. Not big enough to worry about. Withstood a full day of heavy wind and a moderate wind. Campsite flooded, but inside of tent stayed dry. Including the floor. Love the sun room area. 2 or 3 adults/teens recommended for set up, but I could probably manage alone if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: farmfletch

customer_reviews.title: Instructions are awful, but the tent is GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: So, the instructions are terrible. They referece "color coded" rods but don't explain what colors go where. That said, laid the tent out, watched a YouTube video or someone reviewing the tent and figured out how to get the poles started and it went up very fast after that! The tent is HUGE and has 2 rooms. Its a great tent, very sturdy feeling. It has loads of windows for airflow. There is only 1 port for an extension cord. But the way the tent is designed you could easily fit another cord through the hole, or even in the door and just zip the door shut up to the cord.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Bolinger

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Tent
customer_reviews.text: We just got back from a 10 day camping trip using this tent and it was awesome. It was a downpour for two of the night we were there and it didn’t leak at all. It was fairly easy to put up and take down. The only thing negative I could say is that it definitely couldn’t sleep 16 people unless they were laying on lithe floor side by side with no room for movement. My family of 5 were more than comfortable. My 3 kids were on one side and my husband and I were on the other. All in all I’m very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: April Richardson

customer_reviews.title: great value.
customer_reviews.text: great tent. very large. 3 rooms and tall enough to stand in. the instructions suck though. it took a lot of trial and error before realizing the slots for the poles are color coded. after incorrectly inserting the wrong poles into the wrong slots a couple of times the seams start to tear slightly. be gentle and dont force it and it should last a while.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: but once I color coded the fiberglass poles to the sleeves all was good.
customer_reviews.text: Big and roomy. Instructions to put it together were vague, but once I color coded the fiberglass poles to the sleeves all was good.
customer_reviews.author: Arbo

customer_reviews.title: would be five stars but you got four
customer_reviews.text: I got it today and set it up ASAP! Once up no problem, but its confusing when setting up. Its supposed to be color coded, but no where does it tell you where each poll should go, its a guessing game. But once you figure out where the grey stripped pole goes, which by the way they go in the middle in the front and back of the tent not on the corners! Other then that no problem my family and I love it, very spacious, lots of room for mattress and extra storage!
customer_reviews.author: Day L. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I'm very unhappy about this product, the 1st tent have 4 holes in I, company replaced it awesome! Second tent broken polls. Because I disposed of the 1st tent I couldn't use the polls. I received the replacement polls and 2 polls the ones I needed were broke too. For what I paid I'm very disappointed with the quality. This is the right size for my large family but I can't use it do to broken items. Hope you guys figuer it out. It's been over a month and I keep telling the kids maybe next weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad design with Center divider permanent
customer_reviews.text: Sets up pretty easy good size 10 but you lose tons of space with the Sonnen Center divider it would be the best time I have ever purchased iPhone 10 different tents but the center divider that's not removable you lose half the tent space like the color and decent Construction
customer_reviews.author: Jay Jeeninga

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly huge tent!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tent as a Mother’s Day present for myself. I hate camping, but I need to go because I work with a young women’s church group. This tent was perfect for our needs. We actually fit five old women with cots and foam pads in comfortably. It kept us warm and dry. For being such a huge tent, the set-up was easy enough for my teenaged kids to handle. It comes with a large footprint, so this is not for a smaller campsite. Besides, it’s a really pretty color! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Brown

customer_reviews.title: SEE MY ATTACHED PHOTOS TO SEE CLEAR INSTRUCTIONS!
customer_reviews.text: The tent is great. It has two rooms, which you make into 2 or 3 rooms. There is a white-ish sheet-looking thing which is used to make the 3rd room. The 3rd room is 1/4 of the tent. It is SO much easier to put up and put back in the bag than other tents. The only problem with this tent is that the instructions are not clear, so that's why I wrote this review. I attached photos of how to set up. I hope they are more clear than the ones included. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Minett

customer_reviews.title: We like that adults can stand in it without crouching over
customer_reviews.text: Our family really likes this spacious tent. We like that adults can stand in it without crouching over. We fit multiple air mattresses and all of our stuff in it. The only complaint that we have is that the room separator comes up out of the floor so you constantly have a trip hazzard in the middle of the tent even when the tent isn't separated into rooms.
customer_reviews.author: davidsom

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase, precisely for what we wanted for our first family camping trip; good head room and separation of rooms for parents/kids. Plenty of light available from windows.
customer_reviews.author: jdellasi

customer_reviews.title: Pole malfunction! Quality control needed!
customer_reviews.text: Tent came by mail in quick timing. When we set up the tent for use we were disappointed to find one pole was not properly pieced together. It had two female ends, instead of a male and female to properly align. Thank goodness we had electrical tape to help! I recommend that the manufacturer double and triple check their merchandise parts before sending out. This will guarantee the quality of the product and satisfy the consumer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tent
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome tent and so big! We had a double queen and two double twins with tons of room to spare! This is a great family tent and well work the money! Buy it you will not regret!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B

customer_reviews.title: spacious, hard to put up
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and 3 rooms if needed. I found it a little hard to put up.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: This tent is AMAZING! we took it to TN
customer_reviews.text: This tent is AMAZING! we took it to TN.. on vacation! It takes about 10-15 minutes to put up.. You need to go to youtube to figure out how to put it together.. We looked at a picture and figured it out..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was gonna be big. And I thought the doors was going be on both sides of the divide. Doesn't really make sence to have them both on the same side. But seems to be made nice.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: not for windy days
customer_reviews.text: it folded like paper when the wind blew poles broke
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most awesome thing I have ever spent my money on
customer_reviews.text: Most awesome thing I have ever spent my money on, however I feel like it only comfortable fits about 10 people. Nonetheless, it was perfect for my purpose and everyone had more than enough room, much larger than I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Bebe

customer_reviews.title: Leaked
customer_reviews.text: Best tent ever until it rains. We used 8 cans of sealer and still leaked. It was a light steady rain. After 4 hours it started to leak. Very disappointed because we really loved this tent.
customer_reviews.author: Grace VanBelle

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time as promised- despite a holiday. Not great assembly directions- but an awesome tent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service, but shoddy quality.
customer_reviews.text: Upon initial setup, one poke was broken. Seller responded and sent a replacement immediately. After first use on a flat, sandy campsite, floor had significant damage and wear, plus a small hole.
customer_reviews.author: ItsRowbear

customer_reviews.title: Leaks but company handled it nicely
customer_reviews.text: We did have two leaks from torn seams on our first use. May have just been a faulty unit? The company was amazing to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: set up was easy. I made the kids do it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a camping trip I take my ASB class on each summer. We had fourteen girls in the tent along with all their sleeping bags and pillows and backpacks. They were not crowded. Plus, set up was easy. I made the kids do it, and they had no problems. I recommend this tent.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tent because I take my church youth group camping every year. We normally have 12-15 each trip. This tent is advertised as a 16 man tent. This tent was easy to set up and weathered a rain storm, BUT IT IS ONLY A 6 MAN TENT NOT 16 as advertised! Very disappointed! Falsely advertised!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Hankee

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and grandsons love it gives them lot's of room.my grandsons are big boys.and they can stand up and walk around.
customer_reviews.author: Janis I Dunbar

customer_reviews.title: you will be glad you did
customer_reviews.text: make sure to use the tie downs for the poles if you are expecting any winds. you will be glad you did.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, super roomy, easy to set up with two people.
customer_reviews.author: MommaBear

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: i used on the beach and no complains, pretty good quality
customer_reviews.author: otrebororrazip

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a big tent for the whole family!!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is awesome!! Easy to put up and it’s huge!!
customer_reviews.author: Frydshrmpinla

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love the space. Horrible torrential rain storm and the seams at the doors and windows did leak, but sprinkles didn’t leak. Would recommend if you need space.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy tent
customer_reviews.text: Poles are way sturdier than most tents I’ve looked at. Instructions were not very helpful when it comes to setting up thou! Overall it’s a great tent for our family of 5 with storage room as well!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Broke pole
customer_reviews.text: One of the fiberglass poles elastic was broke in 2. So can't use that pole. Have to try and find another one. Don't know about water resistance only put it up once to see how.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: How to put the tent together
customer_reviews.text: Tent won’t fit back in the bag Huge tent, much room in the tent You can stand up in the tent No leaks Needs a shelter over the door
customer_reviews.author: Danny R. Yount

customer_reviews.title: Tent went up very easily. The size was great but didn't care for ...
customer_reviews.text: Tent went up very easily. The size was great but didn't care for the way the corners angled in..lost room for 2 queen sized beds could only get 1 queen side bed in each section of the "bedroom".
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Great Tent!
customer_reviews.text: Withstood a week of punishing Oklahoma winds with no problems. Love the spacious interior. Enough room for everything including an inflatable couch. One night even took the rain fly off to sleep under the stars!
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This tent was great for our family of 5. We had plenty of room with 4 air mattresses and extra room for other things. Would recommend this tent to anyone
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Big tent!
customer_reviews.text: Very huge tent. Easily fits 10 people. You just have to have enough help to set it up. I had all ten people set it up and we did it like in less than 20 mins reading the instructions. Instructions overall are easy to understand. Dividers inside are great feature.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo805

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! We've not seen rain or wind yet but I am very pleased so far. Perfect size for our family of 8.
customer_reviews.author: Heather W. Bean

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tent!
customer_reviews.text: This is our first tent we took out camping. We love it! Its very nice and roomy which is part of our purchasing decision. Took 15 mins for us to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality material
customer_reviews.text: VERY large tent, probably won't fit in most standard size tent sites. Started ripping at seams on our first trip and completely ripped on the second trip...returning for my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie gather

customer_reviews.title: Not worth 10 dollars.
customer_reviews.text: Its not worth the money... I have started thé refund process already. Please dont waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best tent ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Have been on at least a half a dozen camping trips in different climates in this tent already and even lived in it for a month with my husband and two large dogs for a month while we we in the house buying process. Enough space inside for two full size mattresses, two large dog crates, two people plus all our stuff. My favourite out of several different tents I own. Great quality been through some pretty rough weather and stayed cozy and dry
customer_reviews.author: Ilovehavoc1995

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good in warmer weather but sucks in cold weather as the top is open
customer_reviews.author: Paul Leopard

customer_reviews.title: This tent is the best tent for quality and cost
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tent. Easy set up. Easy break down and fit in bag with ease. Durable floor, more like a heavy tarp inside. It was great sized. We had queen blow up matress and two twins. There was room to move standing up straight, area to sit on the floor and play board games. I have 0 complaints or negative comments.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the screen room is great when it rains out. My grand-daughters have a place to play.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Test for Perfect Weather.
customer_reviews.text: Huge tent. You could put a tent in this tent if you wanted. Do not use this while camping if you have the risk of heavy rain or wind or both. Unless you like to swim in the tent. It is barely weather proof, but works well on calm summer nights. Has a nice hole to stick your orange extension cord through so you can charge all of your devices and use the plug-in air pump for your mattresses.
customer_reviews.author: TheReal.Dave.S

customer_reviews.title: Cool tent
customer_reviews.text: Giving 4 as the tent does pull up in the center which is annoying and a hazard at night. Otherwise this tent stood up with some small tears after being blown into our swimming pool with disc obed bunk beds and two iron chairs inside it! Despite tears and scratches from its pool plunge we stayed dry on two heavy rain nights @ 7500 ft. Stayed warm by zipping closed half of tent and sleeping all on one side......wish I'd thought of that first night. Loved the tent worked out great for us. It is pretty big.
customer_reviews.author: Maximalist camper

customer_reviews.title: Great tent got it set up in under 20 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Great tent got it set up in under 20 minutes. We comfortably had 8 people with cots and room to walk around.
customer_reviews.author: victor

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very spacious Easy to set up Love the amount of Windows and ventilation
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great family tent!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our family of 5 because we use 4 cots & a pack n play when we go camping & we wanted room for the kids to play when it rains. The tent did great! It goes up in about 30 minutes & down in about the same. Just match up the colors on the poles for easy assembly. The directions aren't that great, but I had watched YouTube reviews so we just did what the videos suggested. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice tent for the price. Instructions not easy to understand, but managed with three people.
customer_reviews.author: NancetheDance

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect everything was there the package got here on time I think a day earlier
customer_reviews.author: Keith Settles

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far it is doing well went camping for 4 days
customer_reviews.author: mike gray

customer_reviews.title: Held up in wind. Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Tent is very large. Was a little concerned about several reviews saying it was not very strong and poles would break in high winds. Used it over a weekend in South Dakota with over 20MPH winds. We left the rain fly off during the day and it held up great with no rips, holes, collapsing, or poolees snapping. I will say, it is a little confusing setting up the first time, but we had it up in about 10 minutes with 4 dudes helping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy tent
customer_reviews.text: First time camper... I needed a tent to hold 5 of us and was scared it was going to take forever to put together. To my surprise it was incredibly easy and held 4 queen size mattresses with room for 2 big dogs! It held up very well. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Penelope Keys

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed with cool tent
customer_reviews.text: Whoever translated instructions into English needs to be fired right away. Instructions really confusing. I ripped a corner because I tried to insert a long pole where I should have inserted a short one. I called VMInnovations and told them about my problem. They didn't offer to replace my tent. I would have demanded a new one but my camping trip is coming up and I need to use it right away. Tent is cool but too flimsy and needs clearer instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse G

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tent with the intention of living in it for the summer. The sun made the fabric brittle within a month, and light pressure produces explosive large holes. Good construction, and nice layout, but the the amount of money this thing costs, I think the fabric should be of higher quality- and it should be waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: grapefruit mama

customer_reviews.title: Keep your money
customer_reviews.text: if you are interested in this tent don't be. The only kind words I have to say about it is its size and look. Directions are crap. Materials are crap. Mine came with a rip in the window and was missing one of the poles. Then their was a little wind and the whole thing collapsed. I have lived in Colorado all my life and have owned dozens of tents. I have never been so disappointed. The only advantage to this tent is that I won't have to worry about packing it back up... Right in the trash. Please heed this warning and take your $280 and put it through a paper shredder. Save your self the time and disappointment
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Excited to use it
customer_reviews.text: Haven't broken it out yet, but is well packed albeit extremely heavy
customer_reviews.author: Mason Grey

product_meta.title: Tahoe Gear Ozark 3-Season 16 Person Large Family Cabin Tent
feature_bullets: SPACIOUS TENT: Large yet practical with a generous 7-foot center, the Tahoe Gear Ozark is perfect for group or family camping trips with up to 16 people
EASY TO ASSEMBLE: Easy to assemble shock-corded poles and pin-and-ring system allow for quick setup
WATERPROOF: Features water-resistant 1200mm polyester fly with taped fly seams and polyethylene floor
EXTRA COVERAGE: Fly canopy extends out over the door for extra coverage, and includes guy ropes on each side for securing tent in windy weather
OPEN MESH DESIGN: Open mesh-design and floor vents provide excellent cross ventilation throughout the tent

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
